name: Accelo
css:
@-moz-document domain(intuitsolutions.accelo.com),
url(https://accelo.com/) {
    .navtop__logo img {
        background: white !important;
        border-radius: 1em;
        padding: .5em;
    }
    .box_title .inline_edit_input {
        border: none;
    }
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_lightblue span.name_show,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_lightgreen span.name_show,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_red span.name_show {
        padding: 1em;
    }
    input,
    h2 span,
    h3 span,
    h4 span,
    h4.warning_note.warning_subtle,
    h4.info_note.warning_subtle,
    .marg_10_bottom,
    .alAlert div,
    .alAlert span,
    .alAlert h1,
    .alAlert a,
    .ts_week_staff_ui_select__label,
    .randomstat__stat,
    .fancydate__calendar__actionContainer__ico span,
    .inline_edit_state .bottom_edit_util.rhs_edit_util svg,
    .company_line.color-tuna a,
    .object_line.color-tuna a,
    .filter_drop_options,
    .dropbubble__header,
    .togglebar__tab:hover,
    .navtop__link>.togglebar__tab,
    h1.arial_label_large a,
    .gravatar_select2_big .select2-choice .select2-chosen .select2-choice-label,
    span.work_source a,
    .togglebar__tab--active,
    .taskpopup__overflow__container textarea,
    .inline_edit_state .bottom_edit_txtarea,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup h1,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .marg_10_bottom,
    div.marg_10_bottom,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .marg_5_top,
    div.marg_5_top,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .marg_5_bottom,
    div.marg_5_bottom,
    .popup_budget_type_edit_button_text,
    .alAlert__content__title,
    .ts_activity_text_input,
    .admins_tab_content_wrapper .drag_row_card .expand_button,
    .tag_input .select2-container-multi .select2-choices .select2-search-choice span,
    .hve_link_button af_bail_bttn > span,
    .select2-drop,
    .activity_panel .rteActivityFormat p {
        color: black !important;
    }
    body,
    .upordown__subheading,
    .heading-lined.flex-grow a,
    .heading-lined a,
    .heading-lined__ops,
    .heading-lined__text,
    .heading-lined div,
    .heading-lined span,
    .heading-lined__ops.buttonpair,
    .vertical_flex_container .clean_msg_popup.clean_vertical_center_popup,
    .vertical_flex_container .clean_msg_popup.clean_vertical_center_popup .box_title,
    div.numbered_sec_heading h1 span,
    .help_slideout,
    .navtop--light,
    .strokebutton.strokebutton--icononly--base:hover,
    .strokebutton.strokebutton--icononly--base.strokebutton--forceHover,
    .icon_button_text_pad,
    .af_content__headermain--pinned .hve_sticky_bar,
    .options-bubble,
    .inline-reply,
    .inline-reply__text-area--17px,
    .al_time_entry,
    .togglebar__tab:not(.togglebar__tab--active),
    .name_show,
    .filter_drop_date_wrapper,
    .dropbubble--relative,
    .inline_edit_input .inline_edit_rhs,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_lightblue span.name_show,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_lightgreen span.name_show,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_red span.name_show,
    .admins_tab_content_wrapper .strokebutton.strokebutton--icononly--base,
    .admins_tab_content_wrapper .white_nested_content,
    .select2-results .select2-result-label,
    h4.warning_note.warning_note_grey, h4.info_note.warning_note_grey,
    .singleSelect__styleOverlay,
    h1.hve_section_med .af_white_layer.narrow_white_layer,
    h1.hve_section_med .af_white_layer.narrow_white_layer a:hover,
    .viewing_pane_dialogue,
    .viewing_pane_top_fix .view_pane_title,
    .viewing_pane_dialogue textarea,
    .meta_pane_top_fix .plain_content.grey_content,
    .activity_view_full.activity_create_inline .ap_footer_content,
    .block_drag_nested_list .block_drag_nested{
        background-color: #3b444b !important;
    }
    .accordion_lhs .admin_nav dd li.active a,
    .accordion_lhs .admin_nav dd li a:hover,
    .togglebar__tab--active,
    .singleSelectPostpend__text,
    .activity_status {
        background: lightcoral !important;
    }
    .quicklinks {
        border: 1px solid grey !important;
    }
    .card__subject,
    .bubble {
        border-color: grey !important;
    }
    .card__content__text__clampedText,
    .marg_5_bottom,
    .value_label,
    .name_selection,
    .card__content__text,
    .list_label,
    h1,
    h2,
    h3,
    h4,
    .value_text.restrict,
    td,
    .value_text,
    .schedulebar__labels span,
    .schedulebar__labels,
    .flexsplit__flex,
    .expandacard__list.flexpair li,
    .heading2,
    .parentbubble .parentbubble--header-footer-grey,
    .checkbox-lined-container span,
    .marg_10_right.restrict,
    .flexsplit span,
    .navtop__link__label,
    .hide_600,
    .curve_header_vert_table thead.neon_blue td,
    .emphasized span,
    .emphasized,
    .randomstat__context,
    .randomstat__label,
    .activity_body_edit,
    .expand_button,
    .timesheet_expand_button,
    .x_button,
    .work_button,
    .push_button,
    .tabnav__tab span,
    .activity_body_edit,
    .invoiceCreateTypeHeader__title,
    .ng-pristine.ng-untouched.ng-valid.ng-not-empty>span,
    .activity_body_edit,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer svg,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer textarea,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer input,
    .inline-reply a,
    .inline-reply div,
    .inline-reply div:hover,
    .inline-reply a:hover,
    .recipients_overlay span,
    p,
    .inline-reply__header>div>.autocomplete_cont input,
    .pill:hover,
    .dategraph__column:hover,
    .dategraph__column.dategraph__column--selected,
    .ts_notice .ts_notice_txt,
    .flexsplit__noflex>div,
    .graphkeys__group div,
    .marg_5_top label,
    .hve_linet_focus a,
    .help_slideout *,
    .attachment_list li .folder_link,
    .select3__label,
    .marg_10_right,
    div.marg_10_right,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_lightblue span.name_show,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_lightgreen span.name_show,
    .ac_clean_cont .auto_inputs_cont.minimal_auto_inputs .name_red span.name_show,
    textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder,
    .al_time_entry>.time_entry_container>input,
    .pill__text:hover,
    .ts_body>tr .ts_input_cell_withdata .ts_cell_activities,
    .marg_auto,
    div.marg_auto,
    .nsp_tx>span>span,
    .customerPDF__editorHeaders__header .ta-editor,
    .customerPDF__editorHeaders__header .ta-editor h2 span,
    .customerPDF__editorHeaders__header .ta-editor h3 span,
    .legend_list>li,
    .alAlert a,
    .clean_msg_popup h3.graph_text_inline_edit>.inline_edit_containter span,
    .togglebar__tab--active:hover,
    .g_lightgrey_fill span,
    textarea,
    .hover_data_bubble,
    .pill:hover .pill__text,
    .activity_view_full .activity_minimize_clicker,
    .activity_minimize_clicker .hover_link,
    .actiivty_minimize_clicker .lighter_text,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .viewpage__tabnav .tabnav__tab,
    .invoiceCreateView .pad_5_right,
    .invoiceCreateView .pad_5_left,
    .invoiceCreateView .span2.text_center,
    .bubble--padded span,
    .hover_label,
    .list_pagination_footer div,
    .span3 .parentbubble div.marg_5_bottom,
    .span3 .parentbubble .small_text,
    .invoiceCreateView .rhs_edit_util .inline_toolbar_item:last-child:not(.inline_toolbar_item--iconOnly),
    .cardPopover__association,
    .al_object_result_list>li .result_text .gc_inline_snippet,
    .add_on_txt,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup span,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup h1,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .select2-results,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .select2-chosen,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .triggerRuleEdit__index,
    .select2-drop.select2-drop-above.select2-drop-active,
    .triggerRuleEdit__rules .select2-chosen,
    .pre_wrap,
    .card__content.card__content--compressed .flex.align-items-center,
    .card__content__text__minimized{
        color: #E6E6E6 !important;
    }
    .card a,
    .quicklinks--height,
    .parentbubble a,
    .heading-lined__text,
    .light_text,
    .objectbubble li,
    .upordown__subheading,
    .card a,
    .quicklinks--height,
    .heading-lined__text,
    .light_text,
    .objectbubble li,
    .upordown__subheading,
    .tbar,
    .tbar:hover .icon_button,
    .icon_button span,
    .ts_week_staff_ui_select__label,
    .togglebar__tab:not(.togglebar__tab--active),
    .taskpopup a,
    .taskpopup a:hover,
    .taskpopup .content_link,
    .taskpopup .content_link:hover,
    .taskpopup span.hover_link,
    .taskpopup span.hover_link:hover,
    .hve_table td .red_text {
        color: #FFD091 !important;
    }
    .parentbubble,
    .card,
    .inline-reply {
        border: 1px solid grey !important;
    }
    .leaderboard-value span,
    .fancydate__day,
    .fancydate__month {
        color: red !important;
    }
    .timeline-refreshcont {
        color: white;
        border: 1px solid grey !important;
    }
    .tabnav.viewpage__tabnav,
    .g_lightgrey_fill,
    .hover_data_bubble,
    .recipients_overlay,
    .recipients_overlay span,
    .dropbubble--default .dropbubble__item:hover,
    .left_0,
    .cardPopover__association,
    .hve_line_tabs li span .count {
        background: #666666 !important;
    }
    div.close_overlay,
    div.close_task_overlay,
    div.close_overlay-ang,
    .clean_fullscreen_popup .popup_external_link,
    .clean_medium_popup .popup_external_link,
    .list_filtering_rhs .icon_button,
    .list_filtering_rhs .icon_button span,
    .randomstat__circle,
    .name_selection span {
        background-color: white !important;
    }
    .activity_panel div,
    .activity_panel span,
    .marg_10_right:hover,
    div.marg_10_right:hover,
    .hve_medlrg_textarea,
    #add_activity_body,
    .admins_tab_content_wrapper .content_link.status_link,
    .hve_link_button:last-child span {
        color: black !important;
    }
    .page_breadcrumb.page_breadcrumb--light li a {
        border-color: transparent !important;
    }
    .ts_date_bar,
    .activity_panel textarea,
    .activity_panel input,
    .select2-drop-mask,
    .select2-container,
    .al_select2.select2-container .select2-choice,
    .quicklinks,
    .parentbubble,
    .objectbubble__section,
    .upordown.bubble.span12,
    .curve_header_vert_table thead.neon_blue td,
    .accordion_lhs dt,
    .accordion_lhs dd,
    table div,
    table td,
    .bubble.bubble--borderless,
    .inline_edit_textarea,
    .card__action,
    .objectbubble,
    .pageheader,
    .page_breadcrumb.page_breadcrumb--light li a,
    .pill:hover,
    .dategraph__column:hover,
    .dategraph__column.dategraph__column--selected,
    .ts_notice .ts_notice_txt,
    .inline-reply__header>div>.autocomplete_cont input,
    .inline-reply a,
    .inline-reply div,
    .inline-reply div:hover,
    .inline-reply a:hover,
    p,
    .card,
    .card:hover,
    .bubble.bubble--padded,
    .card__reply,
    .card__content--compressed:hover,
    .card__content--minimized:hover,
    .card__collapser:hover,
    table:hover,
    tr:hover,
    .customerPDF,
    .checkbox-lined-container,
    .parentbubble .parentbubble--header-footer-grey,
    tr:hover>td,
    .combobutton__button--direct-outline-hover:hover,
    .statusbar__controls__prev,
    .statusbar__controls__next,
    .af_content.af_content--main,
    .af_content--main.approvalFilterBar.ui-scrollfix,
    .hve_grow_textarea,
    .ng-pristine.ng-untouched.ng-valid.ng-not-empty>span,
    .activity_body_edit,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer svg,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer textarea,
    .create-invoice-metacontainer input,
    .card a,
    .quicklinks--height,
    .light_text,
    .objectbubble li,
    .hve_linet_focus,
    .tbar,
    h4.warning_note.warning_note_orange,
    .check_label,
    .help_slideout input,
    .help_slideout textarea,
    ul.profile_list li:hover,
    .buttonpair:not(.buttonpair--edge).buttonpair--left,
    .strokebutton.strokebutton--force-white-background,
    .meeting-card,
    .marg_auto,
    div.marg_auto,
    .inline_edit_input.edit_enabled:hover,
    .inline_edit_input .inline_edit_rhs:hover,
    .invoiceCreateTypeMoreDetailsPopup,
    .activity__header,
    .viewing_pane_dialogue.viewing_pane_dialogue--borderless,
    .activity_view_full,
    .activity_meta_card,
    .activity_report_cont_compressed,
    .activity_report_cont_compressed:hover,
    .linethrough_section_title--valuepairs h2,
    #contact_listing .grey_bord_li_item .expand_split_right,
    #contact_listing .grey_bord_li_item,
    .list_pagination_footer a,
    .invoiceCreateView .rhs_edit_util .inline_toolbar_item:last-child:not(.inline_toolbar_item--iconOnly),
    .al_object_result_list>li:hover,
    .linethrough_section_title > h2,
    .admins_tab_content_wrapper ol.draggable_list>li,
    .admins_tab_content_wrapper ol.draggable_list>li:hover,
    .accordion_lhs .admin_nav .admin_nav_button {
        background: transparent !important;
    }
    .help_slideout .parentbubble__section__heading {
        background: black !important;
    }
    span.text_orange,
    .text_orange,
    .statuscode--alyellow.statuscode--border:hover,
    .text_yellow {
        color: orange !important;
    }
    span.text-pink,
    .text-pink,
    .statuscode--alpink.statuscode--color {
        color: pink !important;
    }
    span.text_purple,
    .text_purple,
    .statuscode--alpurple.statuscode--color {
        color: lightcoral !important;
    }
    .text_green,
    span.text_green,
    .statuscode--algreen.statuscode--color {
        color: lightgreen !important;
    }
    .text_red,
    span.text_red {
        color: lightpink !important;
    }
    .statuscode--alteal.statuscode--color {
        color: lightskyblue !important;
    }
}
